CrystalLeaderboards Class Reference

The Crystal interface to the Crystal direct leaderboard access API. THIS IS AN API PREVIEW AND NOT FUNCTIONAL AT THIS TIME. The categoriesToGet proporty must be consistent throughout the lifetime of this class, i.e. the same data must be retrieved for each of the leaderboards. This allows the Crystal SDK to cache the data more consistently and eases the use of the APIs. The categoriesToGet property must also be set before calling downloadLeaderboardDataForID: More...

#import <CrystalLeaderboards.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(void) - downloadLeaderboardDataForID:
 Initiate the download of leaderboard data for the supplied leaderboard ID If the leaderboard data for the specified leaderboardID is already downloaded for this game session the data will not be updated from the server to avoid excessive server load. When the leaderboard data has been downloaded the crystalLeaderboardUpdated: method will be called on CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. There is no indication of an error while downloading the leaderboard data and there is no need to manually retry the process.
(NSArray *) - top20EntriesForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve the top 20 entries for the specified leaderboard.
(NSArray *) - top20FriendsForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve the top 20 friends for the specified leaderboard, including the current user.
(NSArray *) - random20ForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve a random selection of 20 entries for the specified leaderboard.
(NSDictionary *) - currentUserEntryForLeaderboardID:
 Retrieve the data for the current user for the specified leaderboard.
(NSString *) - usernameForLeaderboardEntry:
 Get the username from a leaderboard entry.
(int) - positionForLeaderboardEntry:
 Get the position of a leaderboard entry. This is a convenience method to extract data from the array items returned from top20EntriesForLeaderboardID: et al.
(double) - scoreForLeaderboardEntry:
 Returns the score for the supplied entry as a numeric value This is a convenience method to extract data from the array items returned from top20EntriesForLeaderboardID: et al Note that you should use timeForLeaderboardEntry: for time-based scores.
(NSTimeInterval) - timeForLeaderboardEntry:
 Returns the score of the supplied entry as a time-based value This is a convenience method to extract data from the array items returned from top20EntriesForLeaderboardID: et al Note that you should use scoreForLeaderboardEntry: for numeric scores.

 Returns the shared singleton instance of CrystalLeaderboards.

Properties

CrystalLeaderboardCategories categoriesToGet
id< CrystalLeaderboardDelegate > delegate

Detailed Description

The Crystal interface to the Crystal direct leaderboard access API. THIS IS AN API PREVIEW AND NOT FUNCTIONAL AT THIS TIME. The categoriesToGet proporty must be consistent throughout the lifetime of this class, i.e. the same data must be retrieved for each of the leaderboards. This allows the Crystal SDK to cache the data more consistently and eases the use of the APIs. The categoriesToGet property must also be set before calling downloadLeaderboardDataForID:

Member Function Documentation

+ (CrystalLeaderboards*) sharedInstance

Returns the shared singleton instance of CrystalLeaderboards.

Property Documentation

- (CrystalLeaderboardCategories) categoriesToGet [read, write, assign]
See also:
CrystalLeaderboardCategories for details. Must be set before calling downloadLeaderboardDataForID:.
- (id< CrystalLeaderboardDelegate >) delegate [read, write, assign]
See also:
CrystalLeaderboardDelegate. Set this to Geting an array of leaderboard entries notifications for downloaded leaderboard data via crystalLeaderboardUpdated:.
